Name: Ghost Riders
Description: While the Arauts' propose is to control Leh and enforce the Autocracy's power, the Ghost Riders were once a former mercenary group that was co-opted now operates as the secret police and intelligence wing of their ruling council. Their existence is a secret even to much of Leh's population since they focus both on keeping the Arauts' power under check as well as dealing with any external threats to the Autocracy.
ReputationStatements: The wanderers are required to spread the word.
